verses.roman:
prabhure milāite tāṅre saṅgei ānilā
milāile, prabhu tāṅra nāma ta' puchilā

synonyms: prabhure milāite—to introduce to the Lord; tāṅre—him, Caitanya dāsa; saṅgei—along; ānilā—brought; milāile—when he introduced him; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅra—his; nāma—name; ta'-thereupon; puchilā—inquired.
translation: When Śivānanda brought his son, Caitanya dāsa, to be introduced to the Lord, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu inquired about his name.
